data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Zapadno-Bački, Serbia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zapadno-Bački, Serbia

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Zapadno-Bački
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 139 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Zapadno-Bački, Serbia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Zapadno-Bački, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Adyghe people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, to the people of Zapadno-Bački you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 877 believers in the state of Zapadno-Bački.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zapadno-Bački, Serbia has a population of 122,200.

We estimate Zapadno-Bački has 877 people who might know Jesus, 95,925 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,397 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 877 believers in the state of Zapadno-Bački with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
